## ActionCreator type

Represents a function that creates a [StateAction](./state-management.stateaction.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ActionCreator<TPayload extends object | undefined, TType extends string> = TPayload extends object ? (payload: Immutable<TPayload>) => Immutable<TPayload & StateAction<TType>> : () => Immutable<StateAction<TType>>;
```
<b>References:</b> [StateAction](./state-management.stateaction.md)
